Title: Establishes the crime of illegal employee retaliation
Summary: Establishes the crime of illegal employee retaliation which makes it a class A misdemeanor for a person to share confidential information within an employee's personnel file with a third party with the intent to harass, intimidate or embarrass such employee and such employee has not consented to the sharing of such information.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing the crime of illegal employee retaliation
